rev.desc.rev.desc: Print the build distribute object log for language tables into the correct log file when create custom upgrade
AGMRQ10H53160
Support 9.63 upgrade utility
Store language in the field of upgradeobjects for language related tables
AGMRQ10H47281
Reduce the number of records built into custom upgrade package for normal upgrade utility (for 9.3x and 9.4x).
Only export upgraded data into custom upgrade package for lightweight upgrade from SM9.5x
Print the ignore information into the detail.log in the build folder
AGMRQ10H38236 QCRQ1E110009
Optimize the upgrade tool - part 2
Create lightweight upgrade utility
Build upgrade objects filtered by upgrade results for create customer upgrade
Upgrade Utility: Support SM9.60 upgrade
Set the full object name to output detail.log
Upgrade Utility: Support SM9.60 upgrade
Update the base version to 9.30
Update information in UI when execute upgrade task
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Only build oob dbdict when create custom upgrade
Skip dbdict only when no CM build
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Only build oob dbdict when create custom upgrade
When the dbdict is not oob one, don't build upgrade object.
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Support htmltemplates multi-language
Some records are missed in Upgrade Utility
MR release only deliver English upgrade utility
SM create or save records functions do not work after upgrade to SM940 non-pd
Do not filter dbdict
Build upgrade utility with changed records using SM7.10 as baseline version
Optimized upgrade log during creating custom package.
Modified panel : start, start.code.loop.
there are lot of 'kept customer' records for object 'help' after upgrade to 9.32 with language
Date Format issue causes signal 11 when upgrade Applications from 9.20 to 9.32.
In start.code.loop panel, move syslanguage in $L.file before $L.hobname
remove the code for erddef
Panel: use.code.sigs
if ($L.type=3) then($L.z=$L.z+$L.temp+"='"+str($L.temp in $L.file));
TO
if ($L.type=3) then($L.z=$L.z+$L.temp+"='"+str($L.temp in $L.file)+"'");
Panel: start.code.loop
Fixed erddef exception code for the strrep function.
Panel: start.code.loop
Missing supported language codes (e.g. zh-Hans)... rebuilt construction of $L.send.sql to be:
if ($L.table="help") then ($L.send.sql="object.type=\"help\" and object.name=\""+$L.hobname+syslanguage in $L.file+"\"")
... this avoids using hard-coded language codes to construct the query.
Modification made for CenterPoint Request 37109 Task 32931.
Two problems:
1) The signatures for the Italian formats were not being picked up.
2) Spanish was added as a language in SC6.1.
To correct this, the 11th line on panel start.code.loop was changed
from

if ($L.table="help") then ($L.send.sql="object.type = \""+$L.table+"\" and (object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"en\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"de\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"fr\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"ja\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"iten\")")
to

if ($L.table="help") then ($L.send.sql="object.type = \""+$L.table+"\" and (object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"en\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"de\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"fr\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"ja\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"iten\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"es\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"it\" )")
Converted to use scmsg().

AGMRQ10H53160
Support 9.63 upgrade utility
Store language in the field of upgradeobjects for language related tables
AGMRQ10H47281

Optimize the upgrade tool - part 2
Create lightweight upgrade utility
Build upgrade objects filtered by upgrade results for create customer upgrade

Set the full object name to output detail.log

Some records are missed in Upgrade Utility
MR release only deliver English upgrade utility
SM create or save records functions do not work after upgrade to SM940 non-pd
Do not filter dbdict
Build upgrade utility with changed records using SM7.10 as baseline version
Optimize the upgrade log.
there are lot of 'kept customer' records for object 'help' after upgrade to 9.32 with language
Date Format issue causes signal 11 when upgrade Applications from 9.20 to 9.32.
In start.code.loop panel, move syslanguage in $L.file before $L.hobname
remove the code for erddef
Panel: use.code.sigs
if ($L.type=3) then($L.z=$L.z+$L.temp+"='"+str($L.temp in $L.file));
TO

Panel: start.code.loop
Fixed erddef exception code for the strrep function.
Panel: start.code.loop
Missing supported language codes (e.g. zh-Hans)
Modification made for CenterPoint Request 37109 Task 32931.
Two problems:
1) The signatures for the Italian formats were not being picked up.
2) Spanish was added as a language in SC6.1.
To correct this, the 11th line on panel start.code.loop was changed
from

if ($L.table="help") then ($L.send.sql="object.type = \""+$L.table+"\" and (object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"en\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"de\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"fr\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"ja\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"iten\")")
to

if ($L.table="help") then ($L.send.sql="object.type = \""+$L.table+"\" and (object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"en\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"de\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"fr\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"ja\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"iten\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"es\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"it\" )")
Converted to use scmsg().
